Mike Pence , considered by some a possible GOP Presidential candidate in 2012, has ruled out a run for the White House. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
